ThingDef.label: persona salvaged nomad rifle
ThingDef.description: Unstable energy based assault rifle. Salvaged using scraped components. Its less powerful but it still retains its accuracy.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona ion pistol
ThingDef.description: A ion energy based pistol that is rather cheap to produce.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona salvaged shreder
ThingDef.description: Unstable energy based minigun. Salvaged using scraped components. Its very heavy and inaccurate but can fire over long range.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona mechanoid smg
ThingDef.description: Unstable energy based smg made from salvaged mechanoid materials.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona slug rifle
ThingDef.description: A SMG/assault rifle hybrid. Small, rapid fire rate, decent damage and range.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona salvaged stalkers rifle
ThingDef.description: Unstable energy based anti-material rifle. Salvaged using scraped components. Fires considerably slower than the mechanoid version but it still carries same power and range.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona gauss cannon
ThingDef.description: A powerful charge based gauss cannon. Fires a single but very accurate shot with great accuracy, armor penetration and decent damage. However, it has slow fire rate due to heavy heat generation.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona heavy rifle
ThingDef.description: Unstable energy based heavy rifle. Fires 3 heavy rounds over long distance.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona salvaged charge cannon
ThingDef.description: Unstable energy based charge cannon. Salvaged with scraped parts. Fires slowly and very inaccurate but deals heavy damage.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona grenade shotgun
ThingDef.description: Unstable energy based grenade shotgun. Fires several grenades that explode almost instantly. However, it has low range and rate of fire.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona salvaged energy blade
ThingDef.description: Unstable energy blade. Salvaged with scrap components. Weaker than the original but still a rather deadly melee weapon\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona power claw
ThingDef.description: Power claw made using salvaged parts. Allows quick attacks and has good armor penetration.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.
